item.title: Updated - [PI] Limit on selling an item with certain value
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Kodiak:

You need some google in your life.

Don’t just assume I didn’t do some research before posting my question. Lmgtfy.com is one of my favorite websites, that outta tell you something. -__- I’m a google pro, son.

[quote=“nickypie, post:5, topic:458956”]Ok sorry i misunderstood i know how to do what you want but now since you gave me an attitude you can find someone else to help you.

but since im nice its in the sellitem boolean add an if statement right under the beggining like

If Shopvalue >= 5000000 { ( sorry idk your booleans so idk.

im sure you can figure out how to do it.[/quote]
Didn’t mean to seem like that. And I’m having trouble still.

Read full topic

item.title: Updated - [PI] Limit on selling an item with certain value
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

Edit: I need something like this

        if (/*the price of the item the player is trying to sell*/) >= 5000000) {
        c.sendMessage("Sorry, you can't sell an item of 5M+ gold value.");
        return false;
        }

When people sell items to the general store, I only want them to be able to sell items with a value under 5M gold. I know how to get started and all and where I’m going to be working but I’m not completely sure how to recognize the value of a specific item. Is there some kind of function available to use for this? Or am I going to have to make my own?

My base: Project Insanity (Insanity X)
What I’m Asking: Is there a function to get the value of a specific item?
Why?: I need to put a limit for selling items to gen store that have a high value.

Thanks.

Read full topic
